ABOUT_ME.DESCRIPTION: Hi there! My name is Jeffer Peng. I am currently an undergrad student majoring in Computer Science at University of Waterloo.
ABOUT_ME.EXPERIENCES_DESCRIPTION: I have experiences in full stack development, algorithms and data structures, and Object Oriented programming. I am fluent in both English and Mandarin. I always bring 100% to the work I do and I am not afraid to take initiatives and seek new challenges.

CAPCO.TITLE: Software Engineering Internship
CAPCO.DESCRIPTION_1: Prototyped in a small team the full stack of Object Model Mapper with react for BSAs to automate object modeling process. Distributed the app in both web-based and standalone desktop versions
CAPCO.DESCRIPTION_2: Developed the full stack of two Angular Proof of Concepts apps both independently and in small agile teams for bank clients
CAPCO.DESCRIPTION_3: Implemented elastic searching algorithm in backend for type ahead searches in angular POC apps

Perfect Financial Solutions.TITLE: Web Developer
Perfect Financial Solutions.DESCRIPTION_1: Developed a PHP program to manage a SQL client database to automate file filling and printing process
